## Abstract :

This project looks to show what, if any relationships may occur between the adult population levels of education and rates of
violent incidents.

### 1. Discovery and Data Preparation

Data for adult levels of education by county and state from 1970 to 2000. The data has been cleaned and tidied and a graph has been
provided to show the education level rates over time. 
<a href="deliverable1.html" title="Deliverable 1">Phase 1</a>

### 2. Model Planning and Building

Data for rates of violent crime by year and state were cleaned and tidied. This dataset and  the previous education dataset were combined
to build a model for prediction.
<a href="deliverable2.html" title="Deliverable 2">Phase 2</a>

### 3. Results and Operationalization

Discussing the results of the model and the operationalization of the data.
<a href="deliverable3.html" title="Deliverable 3">Phase 3</a>
